task.title: Fluffy Pancakes for Armando
task.shortdesc: For this recipe, Armando will need the following: ¾ cups whole wheat pastry flour, ¾ cup unbleached all purpose flour (or whole wheat), 2 teaspoons baking powder, dash of salt, 1 tablespoon Ener-G Egg Replacer, 2 or 3 mashed bananas, 1 cup soy milk, ½ cup sparkling water, 1 tablespoon sunsweet lighter bake, 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice

step.cmd: Mix together whole wheat pastry flour, baking powder, and salt in a medium bowl
In a separate bowl, whish the Egg Replacer with ¼ cup of warm water until frothy. Add the bananas, soy milk, sparkling water and light bake until well mixed
Add lemon juice, then stirring the bananas into the mixture while adding dry ingredients until combined
Heat a griddle or frying pan over medium heat. Using ¼ cup per pancake, place on griddle
Watch until bubbled begin to appear on batter then flip Repeat as needed for multiple pancakes
